meanings.definition: A plant of the pink family with small white or pink flowers.
meanings.sent1: The spurrey in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I picked a spurrey to put in a vase.
meanings.sent3: The spurrey in the field danced in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The spurrey added a delicate touch to the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The sweet scent of the spurrey filled the air.

meanings.definition: To scatter or sow with spurrey.
meanings.sent1: She decided to spurrey the seeds in the soil.
meanings.sent2: The farmer spurreyed the field with care.
meanings.sent3: He playfully spurreyed the seeds around the yard.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter spurreyed joy among her friends.
meanings.sent5: The wind spurreyed the leaves across the path.
